basics.name: Jubica
basics.summary: Doctoral researcher specializing in pipeline steel integrity, with expertise in hydrogen-steel interactions, advanced material characterization, and the development of novel experimental methodologies for safe hydrogen infrastructure at Ghent University.

work.summary: Doctoral researcher specializing in pipeline steel integrity, with expertise in hydrogen-steel interactions and advanced material characterization.
